attributes.action: tell the USA to we are breaking diplomatic ties. Or least tell them off, instead of brown-nosing...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The USA has broken a large number of UN resolutions that it has signed up to. Not only this, it had broken the Geneva convention. Many times. We should have nothing to do with such a country, and should sever diplomatic ties now. If it were any other country it would probably have invaded itself already (given it had enough oil)...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
